headline: GRIZZLY GONE WILD 🐻💥🔥 ATTACKS SCHOOL SQUAD in CANADA 🍁🇨🇦 – 11 SLAMMED 😱🚑 TEACHER TAKES FULL BRUNT LIKE A BOSS 🧑‍🏫🍑💪!
text:
YO CANADA 🍁❄️, hold my maple syrup 🥞🍁 cuz a THICC GRIZZLY DADDY 🐻🍆 went FULL BEAST MODE 💥😈 on a school group HIKE 🥾🌲 in BELLA COOLA, BC! 📍🗺️ THURSDAY AFTERNOON TRAIL TURNED into BEAR BARBIE 💅🐻 BRAWL – 11 KIDS + TEACHERS BODIED 😵🚑, TWO CRIT AF 🚨💀, droppin' like it's a HORROR FLICK 🎥👻! Teacher DUDE 🧑‍🏫🔥 'got the WHOLE BRUNT' 🍑💥 takin' hits like a CANADIAN HOCKEY ENFORCER 🏒🥊, while ADULTS SPRAYIN' BEAR JUICE 💨🐻🚫 tryna YEET the furry menace away! PUN GAME: this bear was HUNGRY for that SCHOOL LUNCH 🥪😏 but got a FACE FULL OF PEPPER SPRAY 🌶️🔥 instead!

MOMMY VERONICA SCHOONER 👩‍👧💅 spillin' TEA ☕: her 10YO SON 🧒 was in the squad but DODGED the CLAWS ✌️😅 – bear RAN SO CLOSE he FELT THAT FURRY FUR 😻🐻 'like a grizzly cuddle gone WRONG 💔😂!' BC EMERGENCY SQUAD 🚑🆘 reportin': 2 CRIT, 2 SERIOUS 😷, 7 PATCHED UP on-site 🩹📍 – NUXALK NATION 🏞️👥 from ACWSALCTA SCHOOL (700KM NW of VANCOUVER 🌆🗺️) got BODIED but stayin' STRONG 💪❤️!

RESIDENTS LOCKED DOWN 🏠🔒🚫 – ARMED COPS 👮‍♂️🔫 HUNTIN' this GRIZZLY GHOST 🐻👻 on the LOOSE, NATION droppin' FB BOMBS 💣📱: 'OFFICERS ARMED AF ⚔️ – STAY INDOORS, NO HIGHWAY CHILL 🚗❌!' School SHUT DOWN ⏹️🛑, COUNSELING SESH droppin' like therapy for TRAUMA 🎭🧠 – 'HARD TIME but GRATEFUL for our TEAM + STUDENTS 🥺🙏!' 

Bear probs thought it was PICNIC TIME 🧺🍖 but nah, this is CANADA 🍁🐻 – grizzlies don't play! WHERE'S JUSTIN TRUDEAU 🥺🇨🇦 with the BEAR HUGS 🤗🐻 or ELON'S ROBODOGS 🚀🤖 to track this beast? WALL STREET bears 📉🐻 quakin' but this REAL GRIZZLY SLAYIN' TRAILS 🔥🥾! PRAYERS UP 🙏🚑 for the squad – stay safe, eh? 🍁😤💦!
